resources.string:
"Start by opening Settings in the menu.
Choose 'Mqtt broker IP' and fill in the IP-address of your Mqtt broker. 
 Also fill in the username and password if your broker wants that. 

Next, click Buttons. Here you can set the label, topic and codes for each button. When a button is clicked, a Mqtt message are sent to the Mqtt broker specified above.The message has the button's topic and the code is the payload.
If you dont set a label for a button it won't be activated."
